response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to you, is now available for purchase. I am offering it to you at a special price, reflecting my desire to ensure you have the chance to own something truly exceptional. My offer for the product is $950,000. I trust this price reflects a fair exchange and allows you to secure this valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
